summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Willow Street, from Rainier Avenue to Seward Park Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 92672 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
